subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In the teams’ first meeting since Game 7 of last season’s Eastern Conference finals, Valtteri Filppula’s late goal helped Tampa Bay prevent the Rangers from matching a club-record winning streak.
snippet: In the teams’ first meeting since Game 7 of last season’s Eastern Conference finals, Valtteri Filppula’s late goal helped Tampa Bay prevent the Rangers from matching a club-record winning streak.
